abstract: Hundreds of people assembled to protest against the World Economic Forum at place Mont Blanc in central Geneva on Saturday.
snippet: Hundreds of people assembled to protest against the World Economic Forum at place Mont Blanc in central Geneva on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of people assembled to protest against the World Economic Forum at place Mont Blanc in central Geneva at 2 p.m. on Saturday afternoon. The local authorities had banned the protest more than a week beforehand, but police agreed on Friday that demonstrators could gather at the agreed point, although they were not given permission to march through the banking district as the organizers had hoped.

headline.main: Protesters Clash With Police in Geneva
